statements: SELECT * FROM ComplianceReports;
SELECT report_name, compliance_score FROM ComplianceReports ORDER BY compliance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceReports WHERE compliance_score > 90;
SELECT report_name, query_used FROM ComplianceReports WHERE report_id = 5;
SELECT AVG(compliance_score) AS avg_score FROM ComplianceReports;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceReports WHERE compliance_score > 80;
SELECT report_name, compliance_score FROM ComplianceReports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceReports WHERE query_used LIKE '%security%';
SELECT report_name FROM ComplianceReports WHERE compliance_score < 50 ORDER BY compliance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceReports WHERE report_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR compliance_score BETWEEN 60 AND 80;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT query_id, report_date FROM ComplianceReports WHERE pass_fail = 'TRUE';
SELECT query_description, pass_fail FROM SQLQueries INNER JOIN ComplianceReports ON SQLQueries.query_id = ComplianceReports.query_id;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceReports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SQLQueries ORDER BY regulation_id ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, pass_fail FROM ComplianceReports WHERE pass_fail = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceReports ORDER BY report_date DESC, report_id;
SELECT report_id, query_description FROM ComplianceReports JOIN SQLQueries ON ComplianceReports.query_id = SQLQueries.query_id;
SELECT report_date, COUNT(*) FROM ComplianceReports GROUP BY report_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT report_id, pass_fail, query_description FROM ComplianceReports LEFT JOIN SQLQueries ON ComplianceReports.query_id = SQLQueries.query_id WHERE pass_fail = FALSE ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports;
SELECT report_name, compliance_level FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_level='High';
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body FROM regulations WHERE compliance_status=true;
SELECT query_text, compliance_requirement FROM queries;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports INNER JOIN regulations ON compliance_reports.report_id = regulations.regulation_id;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT report_name, query_used FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE regulatory_body = 'EU GDPR';
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT query_text, compliance_requirement FROM queries WHERE compliance_requirement LIKE '%data privacy%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE regulation_name = 'GDPR';
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT query_text FROM queries WHERE query_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY query_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations WHERE regulation_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM queries WHERE query_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY query_id
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin'
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT reg_description, reg_status FROM cyber_regulations WHERE reg_status = 'Active';
SELECT query_description, query_text FROM sql_queries WHERE query_id = 3;
SELECT report_id, reg_id, compliance FROM compliance_status WHERE compliance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT cr.reg_description, cr.reg_category, cs.compliance FROM cyber_regulations cr JOIN compliance_status cs ON cr.reg_id = cs.reg_id WHERE cs.compliance = true;
SELECT cs.compliance, qr.result_text FROM compliance_status cs JOIN query_results qr ON cs.query_id = qr.query_id WHERE qr.result_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT cr.reg_category, COUNT(cs.compliance) AS compliance_count FROM cyber_regulations cr JOIN compliance_status cs ON cr.reg_id = cs.reg_id GROUP BY cr.reg_category HAVING compliance_count > 0;
